caption.p: Inhibitory effect of drug candidates in mice. C57BL/6 mice were treated orally once daily starting 1 day before infection and continuing until sacrifice with the respective drug at the maximum tolerated dose individually (A) or in combination (B). The animals were infected intranasally with 10 3 TCID 50 of PR8. Three days post-infection, the animals were sacrificed and the lung titers were quantified by limited dilution method and expressed as TCID 50/g tissue. Bars indicate group means, and the dotted line reflects the detection limit of the assay. One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) with Dunnett's Multiple Comparison Test was used for statistical analyses (no significance (n.s.), * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001).
